channel.title: http on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in http on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Httpd
item.description: httpd访问网络配置httpd_can_network_connect 检查网络访问的配置 getsebool -a | grep httpd_can_network_connect 如结果如下 httpd_can_network_connect –> off 则执行如下命令打开： SELinux命令，临时配置，重启后失效 setsebool httpd_can_network_connect=1 写入配置文件的命令，重启后保留 setsebool -P httpd_can_network_connect 1
